Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Library related operation with various library workflow activities
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_START><IIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</IIIIIIIIIIII><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE><INP_LOG_SEVERITY class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">INFO</INP_LOG_SEVERITY><IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII><INP_PERFORM_LIBRARY_OPERATIONS class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_PERFORM_LIBRARY_OPERATIONS><INP_CREATE_LIBRARY class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_CREATE_LIBRARY><INP_LIBRARY_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_LIBRARY_NAME><INP_DELETE_LIBRARY_POST_CREATION class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_DELETE_LIBRARY_POST_CREATION><INP_MEDIA_AGENT class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.MediaAgentEntity" _list_="false"><mediaAgentName></mediaAgentName><mediaAgentId /></INP_MEDIA_AGENT><INP_MOUNT_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_MOUNT_PATH></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_LIBRARY_OPERATIONS
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_PAUSE_STRING class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_PAUSE_STRING><VAR_WF_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</VAR_WF_STATUS><VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_DATE_STR class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_INP_LIBRARY_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_INP_MOUNT_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></variables>

children.displayName: Provide library name on which operations have to be performed
children.name: INP_LIBRARY_NAME

children.displayName: Provide media agent associated with library
children.name: INP_MEDIA_AGENT

children.displayName: Provide email id for sending reports
children.name: INP_EMAIL_ID

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

Activity.description: executes a set of activities when the workflow completes
Activity.name: OnWorkflowComplete

inputs.val: <inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_STATUS}</INP_STATUS><INP_JOBID class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}</INP_JOBID><INP_WORKFLOW_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName}</INP_WORKFLOW_NAME><INP_START_TIME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</INP_START_TIME><INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE}</INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>
